about_the_game:
It isn't easy being a human in a family of witches.

After years away, Hermina returns home to attend her father’s funeral… only to find out she’s the one who has to put it all together. A story about acceptance, the joys and pains of being part of a family, and plenty of supernatural shenanigans.

Gameplay

  • A story-driven adventure game filled with colorful characters and big personalities, both witch and human.
  • Switches between day and night, affecting available interactions. Manage your energy carefully and try to make each day count!
  • Butt into Hermina's love life and help her woo one of three bachelorettes.
  • Multiple endings! Your decisions throughout the game will affect which ending you get, so make your choices carefully.

Key Features

  • Gardening! 9 different types of flowers and herbs can be raised in the greenhouse of the family home.
  • Baking! Bake desserts to sell or to eat. Can you find all 9 recipes?
  • Potion Brewing! With the help of your more magically-inclined sister, brew up 9 different types of potions to sell for cash.
  • Funeral Planning! Raise the money to put together your father's funeral before time runs out.
  • New Game+! Beat the game once to unlock a harder version of the game with alternate dialogue, bonus scenes, extra content, and more.
